Sankey Diagram with flow weightage

Sankey Diagram without flow weightage

ui-sankey-diagram options

Name type description
container-id string DOM element where svg has to be appended
data Object Node and link data
domain Object svg container width & height data
link-opacity number opacity of link colors
node-align string possible values: steps / endPoints. If nodes have to be displayed based on user steps/levels or nodes without outgoing links should be aligned farthest.
Example1: has node-align as 'steps', the nodes without any outgoing links i,e UserResearch and DataModeler are in the same vertical as UIComposer,depicting steps taken.
Example2: has node-align as 'endPoints', the nodes without any outgoing links i,e UIComposer,Review Study and Generate App are displayed in the last vertical(farthest).
node-padding number The vertical padding between nodes. Default is 80.
node-width number The width of a node. Default is 150.
sankey-rerender event Allows consuming control to broadcast rerender event enabling the sankey canvas to adopt the height and width of the sankey diagram generated.
